plot outline: Fantastic and funny, this offbeat romantic drama follows the fluctuating fortunes in the life of an exceptional young woman, who is bestowed with special powers. When she falls in love with an orphan man deemed unsuitable to be her life partner, her enigmatic tutors work hard to unite them. What is the secret behind the young woman's powers? Will she succeed in marry the man of her choice? What is the true identity of her enigmatic tutors?
title: Aunty uncle nandagopal
plot: Fantastic and funny, this offbeat romantic drama follows the fluctuating fortunes in the life of an exceptional young woman, who is bestowed with special powers. When she falls in love with an orphan man deemed unsuitable to be her life partner, her enigmatic tutors work hard to unite them. What is the secret behind the young woman's powers? Will she succeed in marry the man of her choice? What is the true identity of her enigmatic tutors?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
